attributes.action: that the details of any public tax money spent on MP second homes is not kept from the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British MPs have recently voted that they can continue to use public money for household goods and furniture for their second homes and to keep the details of these homes kept from the public.

I believe that the public have a right to know where their money is going.  If MPs want to use tax money to fund their homes, then the tax payer should at the very least know what homes the money is being spent on.  If they want to keep the locations of their homes secret, then they should not continue to use public money to fund them.
